article.headline: Lehigh 50, Bucknell 39
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. (AP) -- Rob Keefer scored a career-high 17 points as Lehigh held Bucknell to its lowest point total in more than nine years in a 50-39 victory Wednesday. Marquis Hall had 12 points and Zahir Carrington added 11 for Lehigh (13-14, 6-7 Patriot League), which swept the season series with the Bison for the first time since 2003. Darren Mastropaolo had eight points to lead Bucknell (11-17, 6-7), which had its smallest total since a 68-27 loss to Princeton on Dec. 9, 1998. The Bison shot only 33.3 percent from the field and missed their first seven free throws, going 6-for-14 from the line for the game. Lehigh only shot 32.6 percent but made 17 of 24 free throws and had only 11 turnovers compared to Bucknell's 17. Bucknell trailed 19-17 after John Griffin's 3-pointer with 3:23 left in the first half, but Lehigh went on a 7-0 run to end the period and take a 26-17 halftime lead. G.W. Boon hit a 3-pointer with 13:28 left in the game to give Bucknell its only points in a 10:25 span. Lehigh, meanwhile, took a 44-24 lead on a free throw by Prentice Small.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
